user_question: Explain the impact of AI on modern education, and provide examples of AI tools used in classrooms.
final_answer: The impact of AI on modern education includes personalized learning and efficiency in administrative tasks. Examples of AI tools in classrooms are adaptive learning platforms and automated grading systems.
